definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: nei4 liu4 jiao3 yuan2 zhu4 tou2 luo2 ding1

sentences.english: The knurled knob (GG) at the bottom end of the depth adjustment rod can be used to make minor adjustments.
sentences.chinese: 用深度调节杆底端的滚花柱头可以做细小调整。

sentences.english: Optimization on Regeneration Conditions of Style-stigma-like Structure in Crocus sativus L.
sentences.chinese: 西红花柱头状物再生条件的优化。

sentences.english: The stigma is the sticky knob at the top of the pistil .
sentences.chinese: 柱头是长在雌蕊最顶端的带有粘性的球。

sentences.english: Grains of pollen on a geranium stigma .
sentences.chinese: 天竺葵柱头上的花粉颗粒。

sentences.english: The pollen of Crambe abssynica was hardly ever observed binding to the stigma of B. napus.
sentences.chinese: 海甘蓝的花粉很难粘合在甘蓝型油菜柱头上。

sentences.english: Placentas parietal; stigmas numerous, sometimes 2-fid or flabellate .
sentences.chinese: 侧膜胎座柱头多数，有时2裂或扇形。

sentences.english: Inner row of studs establish the initial seal of the pressure seal joint.
sentences.chinese: 柱头螺栓的内部排列构成压力密封连接的初始密封。

sentences.english: Ovarian 2 rooms, ovule much line, style filiform, post tongue shape is compressed.
sentences.chinese: 子房2室，胚珠多列，花柱丝状，柱头舌状扁平。

sentences.english: The style and stigma have dried out.
Styles 3; stigmas fimbriate. Achenes ovoid, trigonous.
sentences.chinese: 花柱3柱头流苏状瘦果卵圆形，三棱。

sentences.english: Stigma exertion of cytoplasmic male sterility (CMS) can increase the production of hybrid seeds in rice.
sentences.chinese: 水稻的柱头外露是提高水稻异交率的关键因子。

sentences.english: Style twice 2- cleft, each branch with a spatulate or capitate stigma.
sentences.chinese: 两次的花柱2半裂，每分枝具一匙形的或头状柱头。

sentences.english: China Table stigma Thousand Years, the trip is still home mountain soul.
sentences.chinese: 华表柱头千载后，旅魂依旧回家山。

sentences.english: Pollination is the mechanical transfer of pollen from the anthers to the stigmas.
sentences.chinese: 授粉是机械地把花药里的花粉传送到柱头上去。

sentences.english: At natural condition rate of stigma exsertion has the positive proportion with seed rate.
sentences.chinese: 在自然条件下，柱头外露率与异交结实率成正相关。

definition: interlocking wooden brackets between the top of a column and crossbeams used in traditional Chinese architecture
